description: This file is the entry point for a React Native app using Expo. It imports the core method 'registerRootComponent' from 'expo' and the main application component 'App' from a local file. It registers 'App' as the root component to initialize the application in various environments.

methods.name: registerRootComponent
methods.description: Registers the main App component as the root component of the application, ensuring proper setup across environments.
